Params: {1: 'Oh, where, oh, where has my little dog gone?', 2: 'ffffffff', 3: '6.3', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 5: '100011616', 7: '-4', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Blatter', 3: "Do you stand here every day because you're a bad kid?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Concordia', 3: 'Of course someone plays with me. Look, me and my little dog.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Blatter', 3: 'Playing house with a doll is childish. With two of us, we can play so many more games.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Blatter', 3: 'Let me think... maybe try whistling? Like the workshop workers do when they head home.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Blatter', 3: "Okay, we'll learn whistling next time. Today let's build sandcastles. You make the base, I'll top it off!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Blatter', 3: "You got your clothes dirty... The old tailor's not gonna be happy about that, huh?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Concordia', 3: 'It\'s fine. He\'d say, "You can just wash it clean, right?"', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Blatter', 3: "It's always this beautiful if you look up."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Isis', 3: "They don't care about us because we're not the protagonists. Our end, our erasure, our sacrifice—they don't matter.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Isis', 3: 'Our secret hideout! No one will find us here, and you can sew in secret...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Isis', 3: "I'll sit next to you and whistle softly!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Isis', 3: 'We have it too—this little freedom in a suffocating world!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Isis', 3: "You've never actually heard me sing, have you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'You helped me stand again and taught me how to dream.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Isis', 3: "No. I can't teach you what you don't know yet, and I can't force you to do what you don't want.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Isis', 3: 'All your hopes and wants come from within you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Isis', 3: 'If you only know one song, I can teach you more!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Isis', 3: "What matters is... you're willing to make your voice heard.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilako', 3: 'No one cares about your story. Even if you tell it, no one but you thinks your doll matters.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lilako', 3: "I don't want you to get hurt, physically or emotionally.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lilako', 3: 'If no one else will listen, I will.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Discord', 3: 'I have... companions now. Maybe more in the future.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lilako', 3: 'I think your doll is very important.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "Yeah. It's important—so is your being here.", 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'After your brain surgery, did you become your ideal self?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Or are you still drifting, just forgetting the pain?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Go back. Maybe one day you'll remember me, but I won't appear again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Loneliness makes every moment with the ones you love priceless. It turns memories into treasure.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "But beyond memories, there's a wider world and many more choices waiting for you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: 'Now that you know your real name, you can change it back anytime.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "No. I'm not ready to throw away my past. It hurts, but it's part of me.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Eleanor', 3: "Then leave room to weave new stories... and don't come looking for us.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'It\'s like opening a gift years ago. From that moment, "thank you" was already turning into "goodbye." We knew the farewell would come, but we kept guessing the time wrong.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Concordia unties the ribbon, eyes shining with hope.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The puppy plush lies quietly in the box, covered in rows of stitches.'}
{1: 'From countless threads, new bonds form as she learns to say goodbye.', 3: '55', 4: 'ffffffff'}
{3: 'From countless threads, new bonds form as she learns to say goodbye.'}
{3: "Discord opens her eyes to noise. She hurts all over, but her readings are normal and her frame's external damage is repaired."}
{3: "There are lingering side effects in your M.I.N.D.—that's what they say."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Why do I keep running into you everywhere lately?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leia', 3: 'How rude! Why make me sound like some house sprite that shows up everywhere?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leia', 3: "I helped this time, didn't I? Didn't I?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leia', 3: 'Will you give me credit for that? Will you? Will you?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata & Shiva', 3: "YOU'RE the one who should be quiet!!", 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{3: 'As she half-wakes, she pieces the whole thing together.'}
{3: "During the Las Prados infiltration, an Ascendant knocked her to the ship's bottom hold. She fell into a deep coma. For a time, her condition had been critical."}
{3: 'M.I.N.D. disorders are complex. Once stable, all you can do is wait and trust.'}
{3: "Since Yata's legs could barely move, she first tried walking on her hands, then gave up. In the end, Egret's loud-and-lively Leia showed up and hauled them all back to Babylonia."}
{3: 'Against an Ascendant, getting away with 90% of your body intact is a decent outcome.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leia', 3: 'So one whole leg is only five percent!', 4: '1'}
{3: "And Shiva, when much needed, was racing nonstop against the ship's self-destruct signal, with no time to spare. The hidden crisis was worse than they thought."}
{3: "Thankfully, all remaining data was preserved and extracted. The Ascendant Ephialtes hadn't modified the ship, and the backup bodies seen in past logs didn't reappear."}
{3: "Scarab's results are recorded in the precise experimental data they brought back, which includes built-in shielding. Compared with current info, it greatly expands the Inver-Device data set."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leia', 3: "The Inver-Device, huh! If it's too flashy, it'll totally clash with my look!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Everyone trades looks, then eyes Discord's frame—Secator's head in particular."}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'If you want, I can alter your clothes when we have time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leia', 3: 'Hehe, Discord, wanna boost your style? Maybe tie a few ribbons in your hair. I have tons!', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'At her unusually firm refusal, Yata and Shiva stare wide-eyed.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Surprisingly, Leia isn't discouraged by rejection and quickly sets her sights on them instead."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Stay back! I have short hair now!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Surrounded by her teammates, the blue-haired Construct no longer feels out of place. She's calm and at ease."}
{3: "Looks like you don't need to worry about her anymore."}
{1: '1', 3: 'She calls out to you as you watch from afar, ready to leave.'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'I have an answer to your question.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'I want to... keep being a tailor, to pour my feelings into the clothes I make.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: 'I want peaceful days to come sooner.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Discord', 3: "For what I cherish and the people I care about, I'll keep fighting.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'The last star of dawn heralds the approaching sunrise.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-3', 10: '1'}
{1: "Before fate's loom, you were tugged by the wind... silently waiting for the cut.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 10: '1'}
{1: "But threads can be strings, playing the heart's poem and weaving tomorrow's prelude.", 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront43.png', 7: '-1', 9: '1', 10: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She reaches out her hand at last.'}
